reviewText: This is a SERIOUSLY  hard to get title in america. The dvd only works if you have a region free player. It worked on my ps4 5 times but region switching is limited. This bluray is region free so it should have no problem working in your bluray player. The first try in my ps4 didn't want to load but popping the disc out and back in got the ball rolling and it works like a champ now! Don't waste your time on the dvd just get this bluray!
well done graphics and acting...a movie you can watch over and over and enjoy it like you did the first
